definitions.definition: respected and admired as very important or of very high quality

examples.text: My parents wanted me to go to a more prestigious university.
the city’s most prestigious and exclusive hotel
The Gold Cup is one of the most prestigious events in the racing calendar.

wordOrigin: mid 16th cent. (in the sense ‘practising conjuring tricks’): from late Latin praestigiosus, from praestigiae ‘conjuring tricks’. The current sense dates from the early 20th cent.
